extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by verifying if NFS is enabled and identifying the Windows Server version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patches provided by Microsoft to address the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable NFS version 4.1
extracted_playbook.description: Disable NFS version 4.1 to mitigate the vulnerability, as NFS versions 2.0 and 3.0 are not affected.
